page.title: 08RECREATION YOUTH CLUBS
page.content: There is a youth club in every area. The nearest one to us is at Swallowbeck.It is run in a Methodist Church Hall.The hall is Rectangular and the area is that of the ground floor of an average house.At one end of the hall sweets, crisps and drinks are sold.There is one person who runs the youth club but there are usually one or two helpers. The club is equipped with one table- tennis table,two snooker tables,a dart board and two record players as well as small games.There are about fifty members but only about half that number go on the same night.Youth Club is on Friday evenings from eight o'clock until ten o'clock.
